5a545257-c1d0-461e-8877-0ffda5d5fd31.description: The badge earner knows familiar routes and landmarks, as well as how to stay safe when catching public transport and as a pedestrian. For example, knows how to ask for help if lost and can identify key support people.
5a545257-c1d0-461e-8877-0ffda5d5fd31.name: Navigation

badge_template_activities.title: Navigates to course training room from a variety of locations using a digital mapping tool and/or recognising familiar landmarks.
Discusses methods of keeping safe as a pedestrian and when using public transport.
Describes identifiable information about their support person and ways to communicate with them, and identifies who to ask for help when lost.

4b0033a3-dbd9-492b-a41e-33202f0f67db.description: The badge earner can present to the Foundation cohort with minimal assistance, and can create a presentation on PowerPoint or a similar program with assistance from peers and facilitators. The earner can also demonstrate presentation skills based on instructions and tasks set by facilitators.
4b0033a3-dbd9-492b-a41e-33202f0f67db.name: Presenting

badge_template_activities.title: The badge earner can present to the Foundation cohort with minimal assistance.
The earner can demonstrate presentation skills based on instructions and tasks set by facilitators.
The earner can create a presentation on PowerPoint or a similar program with assistance from peers and facilitators.

6e54a4cd-2c9c-4ba4-aa2d-6605beddf957.description: The badge earner can explain what zone of emotional regulation they are in at a point in time. They can demonstrate examples of how to emotionally self-regulate. They can list current responsibilities at home and/or in class, and can explain why these responsibilities are important.
6e54a4cd-2c9c-4ba4-aa2d-6605beddf957.name: Self-Management

badge_template_activities.title: Can explain what zone of emotional regulation they are in at a point in time.
Can demonstrate examples of how to emotionally self-regulate.
Can list current responsibilities at home and/or in class, and can explain why these responsibilities are important.

75568402-53a8-40ce-ad5d-17a52bb2b52b.description: Badge earners can demonstrate their understanding of the term 'responsibility'. Earners can identify at least one individual responsibility that they have at home. Earners demonstrate one responsibility that they have in the learning space.
75568402-53a8-40ce-ad5d-17a52bb2b52b.name: Social Responsibility

badge_template_activities.title: Earners can identify at least one individual responsibility that they have at home.
Badge earners can demonstrate their understanding of the term 'responsibility'.
Earners demonstrate one responsibility that they have in the learning space.

810b6d4f-0ce5-4833-b6c3-de407f9aa436.description: The badge earner can describe what wellbeing is with support, and demonstrate how it is holistic. The earner can list at least one thing that they do for their own wellbeing.
810b6d4f-0ce5-4833-b6c3-de407f9aa436.name: Wellbeing

badge_template_activities.title: The badge earner can describe what wellbeing is with support.
The earner can list at least one thing that they do for their own wellbeing.
The badge earner can describe and demonstrate how wellbeing is holistic.

57cd8a4a-0dc3-4c61-b0f9-a110b83ebdd7.description: Badge earners can demonstrate their understanding and knowledge of 'Down syndrome', and describe how it is a form of intellectual disability. Earners understand the program they are enrolled in, and can demonstrate its purpose, which is to support adults with Down syndrome and intellectual disability.
57cd8a4a-0dc3-4c61-b0f9-a110b83ebdd7.name: Advocacy

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners can demonstrate their understanding and knowledge of 'Down syndrome', and describe how it is a form of intellectual disability.
Earners understand the program they are enrolled in, and can demonstrate its purpose, which is to support adults with Down syndrome and intellectual disability.

d0666688-24d7-4af2-951c-9e51d084a8e7.description: The badge earner can demonstrate the skills required to independently update their e-portfolio on Canvas (Learning Management System). They can demonstrate the skills required to navigate the Foundation Course on Canvas.
d0666688-24d7-4af2-951c-9e51d084a8e7.name: Digital Literacy

badge_template_activities.title: The badge earner can demonstrate the skills required to independently update their e-portfolio on Canvas.
The earner can demonstrate to peers how to navigate their e-portfolios and Foundation course on Canvas.
The badge earner can demonstrate the skills required to navigate the Foundation Course on Canvas.

5617be30-d85f-493c-95d4-b568061a9166.description: Badge earners can demonstrate the skills required to write a professional email including but not limited to: Addressing the correct person/ people, writing an accurate subject heading, keeping the language professional, and signing off. Earners can problem-solve when things are not functioning as they should be with their technology at university, including but not limited to: Understanding why a password did not work, navigating new websites, saving and forwarding documents/ work via email.
5617be30-d85f-493c-95d4-b568061a9166.name: Digital Literacy

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners can demonstrate the skills required to write a professional email including but not limited to: Addressing the correct person/ people, writing an accurate subject heading, keeping the language professional, and signing off.

Earners can problem-solve when things are not functioning as they should be with their technology at university, including but not limited to: Understanding why a password did not work, navigating new websites, saving and forwarding documents/ work via email.

6ac78d0d-557d-4c4d-b729-10a8a3b69b7c.description: The badge earner can plan a trip for themselves and others to complete in a known environment and use digital skills to map landmarks and destinations. They also know how to make a safety action plan and what safety measures to use as a pedestrian and when catching public transport.
6ac78d0d-557d-4c4d-b729-10a8a3b69b7c.name: Navigation

badge_template_activities.title: Demonstrated skills in developing a trip for others in a familiar location, using a mapping application and/or images of landmarks.
Can identify the importance of creating a safety action plan, and uses basic safety measures as a pedestrian and when using public transport.
Competently uses a digital mapping tool on a personal device to find locations and destinations.

c3e1ebd6-d080-4dee-8b45-02431fb8fc30.description: The earner can recall and order relative value of money and can explain how spending money is based on needs and wants. The earner knows the approximate cost of items that contribute to a more independent way of living (for example, rent and electricity).
c3e1ebd6-d080-4dee-8b45-02431fb8fc30.name: Financial Literacy

badge_template_activities.title: Recalls and can order relative value of money.
Knows approximate cost of items that would contribute to a more independent lifestyle (for example, rent and electricity).
Can explain own money spending habits and differentiate wants and needs.

d7c65dd6-7c26-4eda-b398-c5b4d974bc44.description: The earner can identify and list key items to spend their money on and can use a basic spreadsheet to manage information. The earner can withdraw cash and demonstrate this task. An understanding of what is cheaper and more expensive is clear.
d7c65dd6-7c26-4eda-b398-c5b4d974bc44.name: Financial Literacy

badge_template_activities.title: Can identify and list key expenses, and can use a simple spreadsheet function to do this.
An understanding of what is cheaper and more expensive is clear.
Can withdraw cash or explain the process of this.

4fe9a755-9158-44b7-98a1-9863ddcd605a.description: The earner can create a budget and monitor spending habits. The earner knows how to use a spreadsheet for this purpose. The earner can identify and talk about the benefits of some items over others.
4fe9a755-9158-44b7-98a1-9863ddcd605a.name: Financial Literacy

badge_template_activities.title: Creates a budget and monitors expenses.
Can identify and talk about the benefits of some items over others.
Uses spreadsheet functionally.

32c23313-c776-469e-818c-074696e7efa1.description: The badge earner can compare and organise different plans, and source the most efficient and cost-effective route. For example, makes class excursions and activities, and develops digital safety materials for pedestrians and when using public transport.
32c23313-c776-469e-818c-074696e7efa1.name: Navigation

badge_template_activities.title: Demonstrated skills in identifying different methods of traveling between home and another location, selecting the most efficient or cost-effective route.
Using leadership skills, can contribute to the design of a class excursion or activity, which meets the aims of the program and uses public transport.
Can confidently create a digital safety message and provide tips for other participants about keeping safe as a pedestrian and when using public transport.

cb0c1565-bc0c-4bbf-b698-6629a2f92067.description: The badge earner can reflect on past problem solving methods with the aim of continuous improvement. They consider problem solving options when an issue arises and are able to reflect and evaluate steps taken to resolve the issue. They can present evidence of how to resolve a problem after independent research.
cb0c1565-bc0c-4bbf-b698-6629a2f92067.name: Problem Solving

badge_template_activities.title: Can consider problem solving options when an issue arises and are able to reflect and evaluate steps taken to resolve the issue.
Can reflect on past problem solving methods with the aim of continuous improvement.
Can present evidence of how to resolve a problem after independent research.

b8430cd8-8f0b-4a7b-814f-094f847e422c.description: The badge earner knows what problem solving is and why it is important. They can show/ recall an example of a time when problem solving was applied, and can explain what steps were taken to problem solve.
b8430cd8-8f0b-4a7b-814f-094f847e422c.name: Problem Solving

badge_template_activities.title: Can show/ recall an example of a time when problem-solving was applied.
Knows what problem-solving is and why it is important.
Can explain what steps were taken to problem solve.

c8737286-6a6b-4978-8d9e-8add2ed13e2b.description: The badge earner can identify a problem, and can brainstorm potential solutions. They can choose the most appropriate solution for the individual, minimising risks but maximising benefits. They can identify helpful and unhelpful behaviours used to problem solve through an analysis of costs and benefits.
c8737286-6a6b-4978-8d9e-8add2ed13e2b.name: Problem Solving

badge_template_activities.title: They can choose the most appropriate solution for the individual, minimising risks but maximising benefits.
Can identify a problem, and can brainstorm potential solutions.
Can identify helpful and unhelpful behaviours used to problem solve through an analysis of costs and benefits.

347bdd9b-1e23-4cfb-86b8-061f5e38fc49.description: The badge earner can demonstrate self-management skills through a work sample shared with the class. They can set SMART goals in areas that contribute to improving self-management skills and responsibility, e.g., punctuality, organisation, etc. They demonstrate evidence of growth in self-management techniques.
347bdd9b-1e23-4cfb-86b8-061f5e38fc49.name: Self-Management

badge_template_activities.title: Can set SMART goals in areas that contribute to improving self-management skills and responsibility, e.g., punctuality, organisation, etc.
Demonstrate evidence of growth in self-management techniques.
Can demonstrate self-management skills through a work sample shared with the class.

0305b4cf-3cdc-4ed3-928d-5e05896505a4.description: The badge earner can identify and evaluate own strengths and areas of improvement in current self-management strategies. They show self-management in a professional environment or work-based setting including work experience. They submit a reflective project that shows evidence of the development of self-management techniques.
0305b4cf-3cdc-4ed3-928d-5e05896505a4.name: Self-Management

badge_template_activities.title: Submits a reflective project that shows evidence of the development of self-management techniques.
Can identify and evaluate own strengths and areas of improvement in current self-management strategies.
Shows self-management in a professional environment or work-based setting including work experience.
